name: Wicked (itch) (Sticc)
description:
"Curiosity killed the cat."

--------

After recent events at a local park, you hear a rumor that there are notes left from the killer explaining the whole truth. You decide to go there.

--------

Stalker will always follow you. You can press space to scream and scare the stalker away.

--------

Good luck!

--------

Fixed:

- Capped fps and slow stamina regeneration

- You will get back to main menu when you die instead of closing the window
